cleaned_text: RELEASE Crystal & Herb Candles Google Reviews corierayvon kamrinwhite Description Our RELEASE CANDLE - (Palo Santo, Sage, Amethyst Crystal) - Clears away negative energies. Tired of smoky sage in your home or office? People all over the world burn sage as a way of clearing energy and spirits from space - this practice is called smudging. While the traditional method is to burn dried sage leaves - sometimes it's just not feasible. People with allergies, sensitivity to the smoke or shared public environments like apartments and offices make burning sage hard to do. a candle version called "RELEASE". Intended to replace negativity with Love, Light, and Positive Energy. Affirmations for the "RELEASE" candle: * My stress is melting away * I breathe deeply and connect with my true self * I choose positive thoughts * Any energy I've taken on from others is now returned to them 8oz: 44 - 58 hour burn time
